txt.en: 'Hello my capable and well-armed friend! I am the soon-to-be pre-eminent food historian, Wingard Puddifoot! I happen to be looking for a research assistant, someone to help me with all the drudgery. If you're interested, meet me in front of Ost Lagorath.'
'I think this will be a fruitful relationship for both of us.'
Wingard Puddifoot can be found outside the ruins north of Gamwich\n\nTalk to Wingard Puddifoot outside the ruins.
Wingard Puddifoot needs help with some very important research.
Talk to Wingard Puddifoot outside the entrance to Ost Lagorath
